item.title: Bonbons aux patates
item.description: Ingredients 1 small potato 3 cups powdered sugar 1 tsp of vegan butter 1/2 tsp of vanilla extract 4 tbsp of peanut butter Steps Boil 1 small potato in water until it is soft when poked with a fork, around 15 min Let the potato cool, when it is safe to handle, remove its skin and put in large mixing bowl Add 1 tsp of vegan butter and 1/2 tsp of vanilla extract to the potato and mash very well until there is no more clumps Add 3 cups powdered sugar to the potato mixture in small batches while mixing together, it should create a semi-firm dough.

item.title: Apple crisp oats
item.description: Ingredients 1/2 cup of rolled oats 1 cup of water 2 tbsp of plant-based milk 2 tbsp of brown sugar half an apple or 2 tbsp of applesauce 1/2 tsp of plant-based butter (if using apples) small handful of granola 1/2 tsp cinnamon 1/4 tsp cloves 1/4 tsp nutmeg Steps If using apples, cut half an apple in small squares and put in a pan with 1/2 tsp of plant-based butter, cook until sligthly browned.

item.title: Wassail
item.description: Ingredients 3 large baking apples, peeled and cored 4 cups of ale, beer or cider (alcohol free if desired) 1/2 cup of sugar 1 cinnamon stick, broken in half, or 1 tsp ground cinnamon 1 teaspoon ground ginger zest of 1 lemon Steps Pre-heat your oven to 400°F, cut 3 large baking apples in thick slices and arrange them in a baking dish, sprinkle a bit of sugar on top.

item.title: Matcha and spirulina latte
item.description: Ingredients 1 cup of plant-based milk 1 tsp of spirulina 2 tsp of matcha powder 1 tbsp of raw sugar (optional) Steps In a small pot combine 1 cup of plant-based milk, 1 tsp of spirulina, 2 tsp of matcha powder and 1 tbsp of raw sugar (if adding it) Cook on medium/high until it starts smoking while continuously whisking it, around 5 min. Turn off the heat and transfer to a mug, enjoy!

item.title: Winter oats
item.description: Ingredients 1/2 cup of steel-cut oats 1 cup of water 2 tbsp of plant-based milk 2 tbsp of brown sugar 2 tbsp of dried cranberries 1/4 tsp of vanilla 6 - 8 entire pecans 1/4 tsp cinnamon 1/4 tsp cardamom 1/4 tsp cloves 1/4 tsp nutmeg Steps In a small pot combine 1/2 cup of steel-cut oats and 1 cup of water Cook on medium/high until it boils, around 7 min while stirring.

item.title: Fall oats
item.description: Ingredients 1/2 cup of steel-cut oats 1 cup of water 2 tbsp of plant-based milk 2 tbsp of brown sugar pumpkin purée dark chocolate chips pumpkin seeds 1/2 tsp cinnamon 1/4 tsp powdered ginger 1/4 tsp nutmeg Steps In a small pot combine 1/2 cup of steel-cut oats and 1 cup of water Cook on medium/high until it boils, around 7 min while stirring. Turn of the heat and add 2 tbsp of plant-based milk, mix well.
